title: Crankshaft Main Bearing/ Journal Checking and Measurement

body.body: Crankshaft Main Bearing/ Journal Checking and Measurement
The crankshaft main bearings are inserted into the crankcase during manufacture and cannot be replaced as separate items.
Refer to the electronic parts catalogue.
